title: Acquiring Appreciating and Cash-Flowing NFT's with Andrew Sayles.
itunes:title: Acquiring Appreciating and Cash-Flowing NFT's with Andrew Sayles.
description:
I’m Andrew Sayles, creator of the NFT play-to-earn game, Ladopoly, and I’m here to share how it works.  Before we dive in though, Zack has a few big announcements.  Two things that have been on his vision board for years are coming true.  He’s about to move into his dream home, but more importantly, he’s about to launch the first-ever Alpha Underdog Empowerment event.  It’s what he originally left networking marketing for, and he feels like it’s what he was created to do.

I’m familiar with a big launch as I created Ladopoly.  It’s an NFT version of Monopoly that is endorsed by Hasbro.  Played much like the original Monopoly, players can win crypto.  There is a replica board you can physically play on and plenty of ways to earn passive income.  Today, I’m sharing strategies for how to earn the most from the game.  One big way is to obtain a Dope President, which will get you $21k airdropped. Don’t wait to get involved, the first donor of a board will earn 5% of all future sales of that board. To learn more, visit www.ladopoly.io.  

What You’ll Learn:

  • How to sign up for the first-ever Alpha Underdog Empowerment event.
  • What NFT’s are and how they work.
  • The various ways to make passive income with Ladopoly.
  • And much more!!

Favorite Quote:

“Just hustle; if you outhustle the competition, you’re going to win everytime.”

-Andrew Sayles

Connect with Me:

Twitter

LinkedIn

How to Get Involved:

Get podcasting help here.

For more on how to grow your business, check out this episode. 

If you enjoyed this episode, head over and visit us on Apple Podcasts - leave a review and let us know what you thought! Your feedback keeps us going. Thanks for helping us spread the word!
